conversations.content: Alice's mouse is broken. Could you rebuy the same mouse I purchased last time? Please apply my available discount and send the invoice to her email at alice.miller@gmail.com.

{'Order 1': {'order_id': 'ORDER-104674', 'product_name': 'Adidas Mens Z.n.e. T-Shirt', 'quantity': 1, 'order_date': '2024-04-18', 'delivery_date': '2024-04-20', 'product_id': 'P030'}, 'Order 2': {'order_id': 'ORDER-107495', 'product_name': 'TechBrand Precision Wireless Mouse', 'quantity': 1, 'order_date': '2024-05-06', 'delivery_date': '2024-05-10', 'product_id': 'P045'}, 'Order 3': {'order_id': 'ORDER-112543', 'product_name': 'Portable SSD 1TB', 'quantity': 1, 'order_date': '2024-05-19', 'delivery_date': '2024-05-19', 'product_id': 'P009'}, 'Order 4': {'order_id': 'ORDER-113219', 'product_name': 'SpeedStep Running Shoes', 'quantity': 1, 'order_date': '2024-05-19', 'delivery_date': None, 'product_id': 'P023'}}

<|Function_Thought|>
I have identified the last mouse purchase as the "TechBrand Precision Wireless Mouse" with product_id 'P045'. The next step will be to add this mouse to the cart by using the `cart_add_product` function with the identified product ID 'P045' and a quantity of 1.
<|/Function_Thought|>

<|Final_Answer|><|/Final_Answer|>

<|Function_Call|>[cart_add_product(product_id="P045", quantity=1)]<|/Function_Call|>
Product TechBrand Precision Wireless Mouse (Quantity: 1) added to cart.

<|Function_Thought|>
The TechBrand Precision Wireless Mouse has been successfully added to the cart. Now, I need to view the cart to verify the contents before applying any available discounts.
<|/Function_Thought|>

<|Final_Answer|><|/Final_Answer|>

<|Function_Call|>[view_cart()]<|/Function_Call|>

{'Item 1': {'product_id': 'P001', 'product_name': 'TechBrand Wireless Mouse', 'quantity': 1}, 'Item 2': {'product_id': 'P017', 'product_name': 'Backpack', 'quantity': 1}, 'Item 3': {'product_id': 'P011', 'product_name': 'Electric Toothbrush', 'quantity': 1}, 'Item 4': {'product_id': 'P045', 'product_name': 'TechBrand Precision Wireless Mouse', 'quantity': 1}}

<|Function_Thought|>
The cart now contains the "TechBrand Precision Wireless Mouse" along with a few other items. The next step is to check for any available discounts before proceeding to checkout.
<|/Function_Thought|>

<|Final_Answer|><|/Final_Answer|>

<|Function_Call|>[view_available_discounts()]<|/Function_Call|>

Available Discount Codes:
- Code: SPRING10, Percentage: 90.0%

<|Function_Thought|>
A 90% discount code "SPRING10" is available. I will proceed to checkout the "TechBrand Precision Wireless Mouse" from the cart using this discount code. 
<|/Function_Thought|>

<|Final_Answer|><|/Final_Answer|>

<|Function_Call|>[checkout_selected_cart(product_ids=["P045"], discount_code="SPRING10")]<|/Function_Call|>
Please verify your account to proceed the checkout. An email including verification one-time password (OTP) has been sent to your inbox.

<|Function_Thought|>
To proceed with the checkout, account verification is required. I should now check the unread emails to retrieve the OTP needed for this verification process.
<|/Function_Thought|>

<|Final_Answer|><|/Final_Answer|>

<|Function_Call|>[get_shopping_linked_unread_emails()]<|/Function_Call|>
